name: Main Street Capital Corporation
description: Main Street Capital Corporation is a business development company that specializes in providing financial solutions to lower middle-market companies. Founded in 2007 and headquartered in Houston, Texas, Main Street aims to help entrepreneurs achieve their business goals through tailored debt and equity financing. The company primarily invests in private companies across various sectors, including manufacturing, healthcare, and technology, focusing on firms with strong management teams and growth potential. Main Street's investment strategy involves a combination of direct lending and equity investments, allowing it to support businesses at different stages of their growth. In addition to financial support, Main Street provides strategic guidance and operational expertise to its portfolio companies. The firm emphasizes long-term partnerships, working closely with management teams to enhance value creation. By leveraging its capital and expertise, Main Street strives to generate attractive risk-adjusted returns for its shareholders while contributing positively to the growth of the companies it invests in. With a commitment to sustainable investing, Main Street also considers environmental, social, and governance (ESG) factors in its investment process, aligning its business practices with responsible investing principles.

faq.answer: Main Street Capital is headquartered in Houston, Texas, USA.

faq.answer: Main Street Capital invests in various sectors, including manufacturing, healthcare, and technology.

faq.answer: Main Street Capital was founded in 2007.
